title: Confront the Elder Brain
content: short cut to High Hall, guarded by Death Knight Stalker Svignee and some other enemies.(The entrance to the Upper City Sewers a Metal Door at X264, Y128.) When you reach on top of Elder Brain, you need to defeat the enemies and get close enough to Karsus' Crown to cast the control spell. You need to protect the caster in the meantime.
